## fromUtf8() function

Should be called to get hex representation (prefixed by 0x) of utf8 string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function fromUtf8(_str: string, allowZero?: boolean): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_str | string |  |
|  allowZero | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
